{2}{G}: Germinate. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature or create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.)

Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever Zealous Scaleblight becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The Zoulev condemned these souls, but we may still redeem them.”
—New Alores Preacher
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Enchantment creatures and enchanted creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Each altar is made out of a kantra's favorite things and a single lotus petal.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enspirit (As you cast this spell, you may exile a nonenchantment creature you control until this leaves the battlefield or fails to resolve. Reduce this spell's cost by the exiled card's mana value.)
Zoulev Envoy can't be blocked.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Kantra of the Raddi family use lotuses accrued from services to feed their pets.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. If that creature is tapped, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Helena's zealots are so short sighted. It's as if they don't know who they're dealing with.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for a Spirit card, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast that card this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Knowing what you're looking for is just as important as knowing where to look.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever an enchantment you control enters or Zoulev Ritualist becomes enspirited, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I call upon kantra for strength. I call upon them for guidance. I call upon them the same as my family.”
[/i]
